name: Captin o blast man
description:
While Out on a routine patrol your ship gets sent way off course. You have no idea where you are or what is exactly going on so you deiced to try and fly around and fight your way through a asteroid belt trying to get home.

Left / Right Moves your ship

Space fires you magical torpedo gun

If you enjoyed this html demo please donate and download the windows version.

it includes komakize aliens and a partical system and shield powerups
